title: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire
description: An all-new Star Wars adventure by the author of Spindoc. Illuminating the shadowy outlines of a criminal conspiracy that exists in the background of the galactic empire, Shadows of the Empire introduces a dastardly new character--a mastermind of evil who dares to oppose one of the best-known villains of all time: Darth Vader.
author: Steve Perry
